# Part 1

##Tutorial Run-Through

```{r japanesedata setup, warning = FALSE, message  = FALSE}
library(spatstat)
data(japanesepines)
summary(japanesepines)
plot(japanesepines, cols = 'green')
```

Creating a Clark and Evans Index:
```{r clarkevans index}
clarkevans(japanesepines)
```

Testing for statistical significance of Clark and Evans Index for randomness in distribution.

```{r}
clarkevans.test(japanesepines, correction = "Donnelly")
```

Findind Ripley's K
```{r}
RipleysK <- Kest(japanesepines) 
plot(envelope(japanesepines))
```

Calculating Ripley's $\hat{L}$

```{r}
RipleysL <- Lest(japanesepines)
plot(envelope(japanesepines, Lest, nsim = 99), .-theo~r)
```
